website_summaries.verdict: The LG G Flex shows off the potential of curved display technology, but it's the fast performance and top-notch multitasking prowess that make this loaded phablet more than just a tech demo.
pros: Excellent split screen and floating window multitasking
cons: Two iterations behind the latest Android version

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device for the price!
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is WOW!!!!! This phone is gorgeous!! I love the curved screen! Pictures, videos and everything pop on the screen. The only way you'd know its 720P is if you came from a 1080P phone. Sound is plenty loud from the speaker and everything on this phone is intuitive. I owned the Optimus G Pro and now the LG G Flex and this is an improvement. I can't believe that Samsung sells more phones than LG. I owned my S4 for a week before I traded it to Gamestop for an iPad. The S4 felt like a plastic toy and junky. Both LG phones have felt luxurious and premium feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schirf

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! I was $200 cheaper than ordering it form AT&T! The only downside is that is only 780p. But I was coming from an iPhone to this and I am so glad that I did. Even the guy at AT&T was trying to convince me not to get this, but this is my favorite smartphone by far and I cannot wait for the 2nd one to to come out soon!
customer_reviews.author: luv2bcaitlin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this phone. I have been a iphone user since iphones came out. I am fed up with the constant new iphones and making the old o.es obsolete to the poin they won't function. I thought i wouldn't like the big screen, but I LOVE it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Chastain

customer_reviews.title: 3 days battery life...love my flex
customer_reviews.text: i like my flex very much...the battery life is 2 to 3 days! the best i have had yet....i like the 6 inch screen...it arrived fast and almost like new...
customer_reviews.author: foxdi60

customer_reviews.title: MLJ G FLEX
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. I've used iPhone for four years. And made switch to LG Flex. I'm loving it. Love the size. I describe it as a crossover between a cellphone and a mini pad.
customer_reviews.author: MLJ52

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary Battery, Robust design
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary battery life, rugged design, I surprise how this phone is in inventory for sale, fantastic price for the value it offers, It is worth buying it. Display is very bright and gorgeous, through resolution is not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SUNEEL

customer_reviews.title: gps dosent work
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone ok but the item i got from this seller edge cellular has a broken gps almost never works if it does it constantly looses the signal the phone stopped charging and become unusable
customer_reviews.author: C. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Love the flex
customer_reviews.text: This is my first android. Love this phone. Although I do miss Siri I don't have many complaints. I'm getting used to the large phablet but I love it. Sound is clear. Curve is nice when talking on the phone. I'm quite clumsy and tend to drop things but due to the size I've not dropped it yet.

customer_reviews.title: it is a good phone for fact i
customer_reviews.text: it is a good phone for fact i,thing is one or the best phones that i get so far /// the only thing is that dont want to up date just it say,n that your phone is not registered yet can you help about that i, want to up date to a better android version
customer_reviews.author: jorge melendez

customer_reviews.title: Work of art!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, just wish it was on Verizon!
customer_reviews.author: Visit WYOMING...It's BEAUTIFUL!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Phone ordered by accident
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Phone ordered by accident. I am happy. After my Samsung Mega got fried, I tried many other phones but only the LG Optimus G Pro came close. After receiving this phone I feel compete. Fast, easy to use, good display and great features. Only downside is no micro SD but with 32 gigs and Thank God, no AT&T blot apps, I got enough space. Battery is way, way better than Samsung mega and performs much better than my work issued S4 and Note 3. Great deal, awesome phone, no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Velez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my roommate and can't get her off of it... She loves it AAAAA👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and in perfect condition, Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This phone is everything i wanted it to be! It arrived quickly, and in perfect condition, Thank you. Im very pleased with my new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Pugal Coyle

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PHONE. Love Amazon customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone after checking reviews and specs over a two month period. Had a Nexus and wanted something larger. The processor is extremely fast, has excellent colors.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Loomis

customer_reviews.title: a great phone with a huge screen
customer_reviews.text: It is what I thought: a great phone with a huge screen. A large screen is so helpful when you are big hands person and have a difficult time trying to type something in your phone. No complains at all, is an awesome 6" screen android cell phone. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Omar57

customer_reviews.title: The volume controls, on and off button were to ...
customer_reviews.text: The volume controls,on and off button were to close together on back of phone,Since the phone was curved,it was fifficult for me manage controls with my fat fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Leeoma K. White

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Gave as a gift. Recipient loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone is really cool. Big screen easy to read. Lots of features.
customer_reviews.author: Billy F.

customer_reviews.title: LG Flex Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, great size and love that it flexed to fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: joel knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're getting into before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Reason I put 2 stars is because phone was refurbished and it only worked for 3 months after I purchased it. I was extremely disappointed. I was so heart broken. I love LG products. Just was not fair. It's ok. I used my old phone for a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all around. The screen is the right size for video tutorials so can replace tablet. It's large but not heavy and has features the IPhone does not eg data indicator. LG have excellent 24 Customer Service and it's worth downloading the LG PC Suite from their site. A really great Phoblet. Will use LG for all upgrades from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Arrabella

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Good phone, But can't set up mobile hot-spot unless I change carrier to AT&T.
customer_reviews.author: LEWIS ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Battery life is much better than mhy Samsung S4. Huge screen. I love the dual screen mode, the quick memo function and the qslide functions. The S4 did have quick memo and qslide, but they seem to be more useful with the bigger screen. It is definitely a brick. If you are using a smaller phone, it will seem gargantuan, but it doesn't take long to get used to. It seems sturdy, but I bought a protective case anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: great phone better then htc, Apple, and the note
customer_reviews.text: I got the phone a week after I ordered it and I'm a prime member but other then that the phone was in perfect condition the box was a little damaged but not anoph to really matter, I put my SIM out of my htc one and put it in the flex and it worked perfectly I entered my email account and all my contacts synced right to it, this phone is by far the best phone I ever had and I've had a lot of phones. I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Candice López

customer_reviews.title: Favorite phone to date
customer_reviews.text: Favorite phone to date. It's pretty big. Not like the note or anything like that but not uncomfortable. Only complaints are the screen not being 1080hp and no option for external memory. Both of which are being fixed on the flex II. Which I'm going to upgrade to.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone! The screen is amazing. All the things it can do IIknow I've yet to scratch the surface! I'm excited for my new gadget! It arrived in mint condition! And yes, with its FLEXy curve, it's center of attention
customer_reviews.author: Marsella

customer_reviews.text: i love this phone its indestructable and huge plus nowadays the lg flex is cheap but i can play all the modern day highly demanding games like gta i even tried the cmoar theater vr app and the Tuscany vr app and google cardboard works just phone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phones I've owned! Would definitely recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! Perfect size for it for my boyfriend and he came but it down!

customer_reviews.title: This phone is great and the curve doesmt affect it at all it ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great and the curve doesmt affect it at all it breaks easy though this phone is fast as hell but cant take a drop
customer_reviews.author: Jacknewsome

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Much better than my old LG. Larger screen, clearer graphics, stylish, different to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: DZ6

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: I can see! Big screen is just perfect. Not to big, and not too small. When watching movies on it, the curved screen really brings out the big picture. The quad core is quick and responsive. Picture quality is quite good. Wish it had stereo speakers though, a louder sound, USB port, HDMI port, and Flash Memory port. Other than that, 29 gig of user memory is pretty large.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney R. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Display is awesome as is the curve
customer_reviews.author: veronica

product_meta.title: LG G Flex, Titan Silver 32GB (AT&T)
product_meta.description:
• WARNING: This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm.

AMAZON.COM


The World’s First Curved, Flexible Smartphone

LG has proven itself to be a true champion of innovation across more than six decades of consumer electronics experience around the globe. LG has now leveraged that expertise, forever changing the very shape of the smartphone category by creating our latest breakthrough, the new G Flex, the world’s first curved, flexible smartphone.

LG G Flex Driven by LG’s industry-leading expertise in high-end OLED (organic light-emitting diode) displays, the G Flex is a triumph of engineering. It represents the latest in screen technology, borrowing from LG’s award-winning curved OLED TVs. The G Flex now brings you a curved form factor that fits in the palm of your hand.

The G Flex is cutting-edge from the inside out. It’s powered by a unique new type of long-life battery that actually flexes along with the phone. And the entire device is constructed from state-of-the-art materials, to perform feats no other smartphone can, for an uncompromising experience.

INNOVATION
The Latest Breakthrough

With more than six decades of consumer electronics experience around the globe, LG has proven itself to be a champion of innovation. LG has now leveraged that expertise, forever changing the very shape of the smartphone category by creating the new G Flex, the world’s first curved, flexible smartphone.

A Triumph of Engineering

Driven by LG’s industry expertise in high-end OLED (organic light-emitting diode) displays, the G Flex represents the latest in OLED screen technology. Borrowing from our growing expertise in curved OLED TVs, the G Flex now brings you a curved form factor that fits in the palm of your hand.

Cutting-Edge From the Inside Out

The G Flex is powered by a unique, new, long-life type of battery and actually flexes along with the phone. The entire device is constructed from state-of-the-art materials inside and out, to perform feats no other smartphone can, all with uncompromising performance.

CURVED PERFORMANCE
6.0” Curved OLED

G Flex’s curved screen fills your field of vision for a more immersive, panoramic viewing experience. Plus, the high-quality OLED display offers bright, vivid reproduction while helping to minimize glare from reflections.

Real RGB Display

The Real RGB HD display yields a clear, bright, sharp image that is true-to-life.

G FLEX, TITAN SILVER
SPEC HIGHLIGHTS
 * 3G/4G LTE connectivity
   
   
 * Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) operating system
   
   
 * Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 2.26 GHz Quad-Core Processor
   
   
 * 6.0-inch HD 245 ppi Curved POLED Real RGB (1280 x 720) 
   
   
 * 13-MP rear camera 
   
   
 * Front 2.1-MP camera 
   
   
 * 32 GB storage + 2 GB of RAM
   
   
 * Wireless-N Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0 + NFC
   
   

6.0-inch HD Curved display. High-Capacity, Flexible Battery

LG has created the world’s first curved battery to complement the design and slim profile of the G Flex. Touting a high 3,500-mAh capacity (3,400 for T-Mobile), it provides enhanced stability and performance for the OLED display and all your daily activities.

Powerful CPU

The LG G Flex packs the Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 800 2.26 GHz Quad-Core Processor, a blazing-fast CPU for smooth, seamless operation, even with multiple apps open at once.

High-Performance Camera

The 13-megapixel camera captures all of life’s moments beautifully, including crisp nighttime photos and precise action shots. Then bring those memories to life on the expansive display, or print and share your images.

CURVED DESIGN
Ergonomic Curved Design

G Flex follows the curvature of your face, for an outstanding voice and sound experience by reducing the gap between the microphone and your mouth. And when held in landscape position, it’s perfect for watching movies or playing games.

Ambidextrous Rear Key

The LG Rear Key is comfortably positioned directly under the index finger—left or right, big hands or small—making it incredibly easy to use with our convenient shortcuts as well as the volume control.

CURVED EXPERIENCE
Dual Window

Dual Window splits the screen into two panels, each with a comprehensive view of a different app for effective multitasking on the wide display.

QuickTheater

QuickTheater gives you direct access to your photos, videos and YouTube. Just hold the LG G Flex horizontally and use two thumbs to “open” the screen.

Slide Aside

Switch between three different apps at once simply by sliding three fingers left or right across the screen, to juggle more tasks, more quickly.

KnockOn

A simple knocking gesture is all it takes to wake LG G Flex’s display, without picking it up or pressing the power key.

Fluid Lock Screen

Transcending art and function, this user interface provides an ever-changing 180° lock screen image and fluid unlock animations with clever sounds.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
LG G Flex handset; battery; wall charger; USB cable; getting started guide

The LG G Flex ANDROID 4.2.2 (JELLY BEAN) OS
An even sweeter Jelly Bean, the Android 4.2.2 operating system's Android 4.2.2's new restricted profiles feature can be used to limit access to apps and content -- at home with your family and at work. Fast, fluid, and smooth, Android 4.2.2 offers effortless movement between home screens -- like turning the pages of a book. And it includes faster orientation changes, quicker switching between recent apps, and smoother and more consistent rendering throughout your mobile device.


Browse and download thousands of free and paid apps from around the world via Google Play or the Amazon Appstore for Android.

Restricted Profiles. Put your tablet into a mode with limited access to apps and content. For example, a parent can set up profiles for each family member, and a business manager can set up profiles that keep employees focused on work.

Built-in Security Protection. Android is designed to keep you and your data safe. Every app runs in its own sandbox, a secure space isolated from other apps. And whenever you download an app, Android can automatically scan it for viruses, checking apps against a database maintained by Google.

Expandable, Actionable Notifications. Android has always put you in control when it comes to staying notified and connected. Just swipe down from the top of the screen to see all your notifications in one place. Late for a meeting or missed a call? Take action in an instant directly from the notifications shade.

Smooth Operator. More reactive and uniform touch responses mean you can almost feel the pixels beneath as your finger moves across the screen. .

Live in the Now. With Google Now, you get the right information at just the right time -- before you even ask. It can tell you today's weather before you start your day, or when the next train will arrive as you're standing on the platform. .

Smarter Keyboard with Gesture Typing. Just glide your finger over the letters you want to type, and lift after each word. You don't have to worry about spaces because they're added automatically for you.

Beam Photos and Videos. With Android Beam, you can easily share your photos and videos.

Google Now.
